name: indiereign
overview:
indiereign enables filmmakers to control and monetize the distribution of their films online. Indiereign takes care of the transcoding, storage, delivery, and payments.

The model for independent films is broken. Of the 4000+ films that were submitted to Sundance this year, only 1% achieved any substantial distribution deal. Filmmakers are inevitably left having to, promote their film, make sales, facilitate payments and handle content delivery.

With indiereign films are sold socially, from within the player on any website.

Filmmakers have proven that they can successfully leverage social media, to raise production budgets via crowd-funding sites. They are already trained in this way of promotion, making the progression to selling socially easy.

indiereign adds a social and gamification layer to the traditional VOD model, increasing the potential for films to find an audience and make money. Users are incentivized to share films with their networks. This provides filmmakers with a motivated, global sales force and multiple shopfronts around the web.

With indiereign anyone can become a film promoter. Allowing film fans to leverage their social currency. Making money and unlock rewards simply by promoting films to their social networks.
